dialogue.text: Hi! How can I help you today?
Hi, I don’t feel well.
I’m sorry to hear that. What symptoms do you have?
I have a sore throat and a runny nose.
Do you have a fever?
No fever, just tired.
How long have you felt this way?
Since yesterday.
Do you have any allergies to medicine?
No, I don’t.
Do you prefer tablets or syrup?
Tablets are fine.
I recommend a cold medicine for daytime.
Okay.
Do you need something for your throat too?
Yes, maybe lozenges.
These lozenges can help with soreness.
Great.
Are you taking any other medication?
No.
Take this after meals, twice a day.
Got it.
Drink plenty of water and rest.
I will.
If you get a fever, see a doctor.
Okay, thanks.
Would you like a small pack or a full pack?
A small pack is fine.
Alright, I’ll ring that up for you.
Thank you.
